entries.text: Thank you for calling Acme Retail. Your call is important to us. Please wait while we connect you with the next available agent.
Hello, I'm trying to figure out your store hours.
Hi there! Thanks for calling Acme Retail. My name is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Yes, I need to know what time you open and close. I'm planning a visit.
Certainly! Our general opening time during the week is 9:00 AM. We usually have a closing time of 7:00 PM, Monday through Friday.
Okay, great. What about the weekend hours? I might be able to come on Saturday.
Our weekend hours are slightly different. On Saturdays, we're open from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM. And on Sundays, we're open from 11:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Perfect, that's really helpful. And what's the parking availability like? Is it usually crowded?

We have a fairly large parking lot, and while it can get busy, especially during peak weekend hours, we generally have good parking availability. We also have overflow parking available across the street if the main lot is full.
That's fantastic news! This is exactly what I needed to know. Thanks so much for your help!
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you again!
Have a great day, and we look forward to seeing you at Acme Retail!
